data.text: @EE Done
@pipebrush @EE I haven't heard nothing off them at all. Did you get a message or anything before hand?

@ee I am mad as hell at you. I have been a customer since when you where Orange. You let me down. I spent ¬£624 on a watch and between you and DPD you can‚Äôt even get it delivered. Think I‚Äôll give O2 a call.
@EE We do have a line, nobody can find where it ends up after it disappears into the wall by my front door
@EE @ItsLewisMorg Lots getting delivered today including mine üòä
@EE Tried to order this as an upgrade this morning but your atrocious website failed. Also taking the piss by charging me (a 5yr+ customer) more for my loyalty. Shambles
@EE I‚Äôve been getting this for months. I even called to report the issue. Still happening. https://t.co/oaIxFd6vxd
@L_J_Gren @EE Yep lots of people getting them delivered today including myself üòÄ
@EE Done!
@BounceNewsNg @ItsEliOyefeso @CryptobuddyInfo @EE
@EE Hi Peter. It's an additional line
@EE I have travel data pass and roam further; and i am in Australia, but I can only get SOS on my service? The same happened in America a couple of months ago?
@EE, afternoon! I ordered a sim only deal on Monday via phone. Was told it would be in post next day but alas, it hasn't arrived. Any help and information would be appreciated
@EE You too ! :)

@EE Hi, we're switching from standard to fibre broadband with activation date of 22 March. Order email states to set equipment up when received however box states to only set up once received confirmation text/email. Which is correct? Thanks
@EE and @bt_uk unveil new sports & performing arts experiences ‚û°Ô∏è https://t.co/yEiLoNie1Y https://t.co/L3nBzo43JR
@EE Thanks! üòé
@EE Wife got home to find all is well. Thanks for your assistance today.
@Leon_Lowen @EE Kevin Bacon doesn't come cheap
@EE Hi there is no number from the text.  It just says Grosvenor
@EE Except it isn‚Äôt, I have BT sport ultimate as my smart benefit and it doesn‚Äôt appear in my add on options
Hi @EE I got a call from this number claiming to be you - 01462 341325 saying they had information on offers available to me. Is it legitimate? Thanks.

@EE The postcode is the postcode for Greenwich Park, it‚Äôs an enormous Royal park covering 183 acres which I am unlikely to be living in unless my personal circumstances take a massive downhill dive.
@68Langers @OPPOMobileUK @EE Hey Andrew. I would wait until you receive the new SIM card first so that you're not dealing without your mobile number! -Lauren
@iD_Mobile_UK @OPPOMobileUK @EE Looking forward to it Tom. Is there a way to submit my PAC in advance or not until I have the new SIM?
@EE put up a temporary mast so we see no loss of service then https://t.co/9fKNBnWJL5
@EE Yes I do
@EE @beatport @Rudimental @ariellefree @itsjuniorsimba Anyone having issues with the network??? I hope you aren't trying to land a plane. I'm having no service!?
Great project @KKRiders @EE @asvpxrocky https://t.co/yWzfeXZjuo
@EE I‚Äôve had one before but no for years - no longer connected
I‚Äôm Gona kill @EE charging me extra roaming fee for no reason
@68Langers @iD_Mobile_UK @EE Excellent choice of device and colour Andrew, only 6 more days until release date! ü§©ü•≥
@MarcAllera @EE @crazymike1988 :-) famous Mike
@EE iPhone 12 Pro Max
@EE Have done
@EE Thanks for clearing that up, how do I do the add on? As I just seem to go round in circles on the website https://t.co/W8cNkArD73
@EE I'm unable to top up my phone. Is there ongoing issue?
@EE I have the @btsport smart benefit - how come I can't always use it on my laptop as advertised? #notworking
@EE Your app isn't working correctly as it won't show what extra charges I'm being billed for. Screen is blank. ¬£3 a min to call the States is ridiculous by the way! https://t.co/1RaEEtgECP

Local ‚Äúfree‚Äù WiFi *much* slower than @EE on #4G. Looking forward to #5G coming to #Harrogate town centre!
@Speedtest https://t.co/VxDZAt79J6

@EE In a few short sentences. I am not getting a decent signal. It drops from 5G through 4G to 3G then E and loses connection when I‚Äôm on the phone. There is no mobile data when I‚Äôm on the phone. I‚Äôm currently piggybacking Wi-Fi ATM
@EE recently got a new phone on insurance as accidentally damaged step daughters and we‚Äôve been sent a iPhone 11 not 12? Can someone assist please asap ? Thanks
@EE can I have an update on my order please?
@EE It‚Äôs Greenwich Park, not sure if there‚Äôs a postcode for the whole park as not a lot of people live in it. However postcode for car park at Blackheath end is SE10 8QY
@EE Hi jo, when I press set up for myself it‚Äôs saying this plan isn‚Äôt supported when I put it my Apple ID?!
don't know why I bother anymore with @EE , getting internet on my iPhone lately has been awful....contract is almost up so I guess its time for a new phone and supplier
Great timing from @EE on my timeline! https://t.co/hSOEz7ECqM
@EE I‚Äôve just got a new Apple Watch but it‚Äôs come with a different number - and can‚Äôt connect to current phone any idea why?! Thank you :)
@EE Hi Chris its not just me its everyone since you put the price up by nearly 10%. Just imagine the kudos if EE said we have decided to cancel the increase this year as everyone has higher bills..

We‚Äôve also partnered with Samsung to help customers with hearing impairments get the most out of @EE and the new Samsung S22 range, too.

When our in-store QR code is scanned it links to videos about the new Samsung series with sign language interpreter Simon and closed captions. https://t.co/VOC0WxHLeJ
@EE I‚Äôm doing good :) have an amazing day

Communication's so important. Small things have a big impact.

It might be the end of #SignLanguageWeek, but we're partnering with @SamsungUK to encourage our @EE store teams to learn some BSL basics with a series of videos like this ‚Äì so customers with hearing loss feel at ease. https://t.co/SzrVK5uzlO
@EE Good morning ! How are you today ee?
@EE I already done the deal, they should of done that without me having to ask really.
@EE Returns team number is ‚Äúvery busy‚Äù.
@EE Really disappointed to see how much more EE was charging me after being with them for so long- (before they were EE) compared to other companies as a new customer.
@EE Hi, just received my iPhone 13 pro max with seal on the box broken. There was no protective bubble wrap at all. Called 150 and got fobbed off. What is supposed to happen? Not happy
@EE I have D'Med you per your request!!

@EE Thanks for responding,appreciated,Im ok,I have a poorly pup so not much sleep but getting there,hows urself?I ended up looking about & found a deal with 3,unlimited Everything on Samsung Z3 Flip,24mnth with insurance but less than EE,so ive moved.(20+yr with EE)Have a lovely day.

Each of our Year 5 pupils planted a tree in the school grounds yesterday!  Thank you to @WoodlandTrust for supplying the trees and volunteers from our local @EE office in Merthyr for supporting the children! https://t.co/jKXRrLtqOm
@EE is there an outage in Birmingham at the moment?
@EE The EE Community has quite a few similar cases so not just me
@EE I'll leave it now, the discount was above a number of phones as an upgrade option, not a new line. I don't expect to need proof and didn't imagine it. Why do I have 4 EE lines, I ask myself!

@EE My DD has been taken and it appears that I've been charged ¬£6.95 delivery due to completing the upgrade over the phone, I only called because the #MYEE System wouldn't allow it. charging me for your system errors seems very unfair!!
@EE Can someone DM me on here asap #complaint
@EE love being mislead by ee
@EE No problem. Thanks for confirming
@EE No, I didn't expect to be needing proof.  I was upgrading my current line and adding a new phone to that
@H_chapman17 @EE https://t.co/d2J1tlKiJi
@EE does Student Beans discount code work on Good As New upgrades?

@EE hello, we're getting your broadband installed next Friday and I just need to sanity check that OpenReach are aware that we don't have a BT socket to plug the router in to. We had two visits from them when trying to get Plusnet set up a few weeks ago and they didn't manage it.
@EE spoke with you yesterday about signal issues - now I have no signal & WiFi calling isn‚Äôt working‚Ä¶ no way to contact yourselves to resolve the issue‚Ä¶
@EE I guess I'll not upgrade and purchase another way
@EE Online, it was just available
@EE  where's this months update for the pixel 6 pro please?

@EE Yesterday I was offered a 10% loyalty discount on an update which I was considering.  Today, however, I am not offered the same discount.  I presume I'm getting that because I'm a long term customer with 4 mobile numbers.  Can you tell me why it's gone please?
@joshsherwin12 @EE @beatport @Rudimental @itsjuniorsimba Thank you!!
trying to transfer my number to @EE and the website isn't even loading?? so now i'll have no working phone for god knows how long
Finally arrived @EE https://t.co/9UAwSYncJg
@EE Done :)
@EE It's OK Casey, I'm being flippant.

Residents in #BTR developments continue to rate their overall experience more highly than tenants in #BTS.

#HomeViews #ResidentReviews https://t.co/q3JgBXbuFy
@EE Thanks Dua for excellent service with a smile yesterday at Solihull, Touchwood store.    Dealt understandingly with the needs of elderly customers.    Thank you!
@EE @beatport @Rudimental @ariellefree @itsjuniorsimba Class set @ariellefree
@EE Internet is down and I do not have the number associated with it. Can I speak to a human about this please?
@EE I messaged EE days ago now, multiple times, and still haven't had a response from you.
@EE
@EE great service from Nicole at Sunderland call centre this morning. Rang about contract coming to an end. Offered a great deal. Signed back up üëçüèªquick and easy.
Fuming at going to @EE Croydon 2 days in a row and their opening times being wrong each time. Wondering why I‚Äôve switched at this point.

@EE absolutely sick of your piss poor customer service.
I've been paying over ¬£300 a month for phones and have done for years and years, yet you lie and take the piss.
@EE Gemma.  I didn‚Äôt catch the other lady‚Äôs name.

@EE I ordered an upgrade phone on Tuesday and had emails to say the order was confirmed and ‚Äòon the way.‚Äô Since Tuesday, I‚Äôve heard nothing from EE or DPD. I‚Äôve ordered it to be delivered to store. Are you able to give me an update?
Thank you @EE for providing such a reliable and fast service. It has proved invaluable after I foolishly tried to switch to @CommunityFibre

@EE I ordered a screen protector with my new phone but the screen protector arrived smashed. I‚Äôve tried emailing, no response, I‚Äôve tried webchat who asked me to call and I‚Äôve tried calling but there are no options for what I need. I‚Äôd just like a new one sending out please!!
@EE If I would be explained that I have to pay 15 pounds extra to watch bt sports on large screen I wouldn't buy Smart Benefit SIM only contract.
@EE Great service in your Horsham store. Very helpful and patient with a couple of older gentlemen. üëç
@EE I am less than a mile outside of Lincoln city centre and my signal is atrocious, why
@ee shocking how something your fault we have to pay, it‚Äôs not happening

@Paula_Griffin65 Hiya Paula :) How are you? I can certainly have a look at this for you as I know being connected is very important. Are you able to pop me a DM with the postcode, please? -Kelsey https://t.co/m14c5xhQi0

@joshua_tasker Hi Josh, I hope you're well and having a nice day. 

It's great to hear you've got a new watch, could I please check, is your old watch still paired to your phone? -Jo

@mng321 Hi Martin üëã I'm really sorry to hear you're having trouble paying your bill, I'd love to see if there's anything that we can do for you to help out. Can you send me over a private message so I can take some detail please? -Chris S https://t.co/m14c5xhQi0

We're on a mission to treat our customers how they would want to be treated.

Usually, first thing we might do is grab pen and paper. That's okay. But there's more we can do to make people with hearing impairments more feel safer, more comfortable, and their experience better.
@SpaceEvie Morning Evie! We're all good here, how are you? -Bob
Good morning and happy Friday! Let us know if you need any help today. We‚Äôre here until 11pm.
@KintmLu Aww I hope your puppy is better soon. I'm good thank you :) Oh no, that is such a shame. Could the upgrades team not look at matching the deal for you? -Kelsey
@EE Hi, just received my iPhone 13 pro max with seal on the box broken. There was no protective bubble wrap at all. Called 150 and got fobbed off. What is supposed to happen? Not happy

@EE Thanks for responding,appreciated,Im ok,I have a poorly pup so not much sleep but getting there,hows urself?I ended up looking about & found a deal with 3,unlimited Everything on Samsung Z3 Flip,24mnth with insurance but less than EE,so ive moved.(20+yr with EE)Have a lovely day.

@ItsJamesPowers Hey James, 

I'm really sorry that you've been left feeling so disappointed by the service when you've been upgrading, I can absolutely appreciate that any unexpected charges are always an unwelcome surprise! I'd like to have a look into this, could you DM me? - Jess https://t.co/m14c5xhQi0

@KintmLu Hiya :) How are you? Great to see you're looking at upgrading. I love getting a new phone. What one are you looking to get?
I can have a little look at it. Can you pop me a DM with a screen shot of what you're seeing, please? -Kelsey https://t.co/m14c5xhQi0
@EE I'll leave it now, the discount was above a number of phones as an upgrade option, not a new line. I don't expect to need proof and didn't imagine it. Why do I have 4 EE lines, I ask myself!
@paulswift36 Menu > Upgrade > Contact us (bottom left) > Message us, or give our upgrades team a call on 150 from your EE phone or 08000798586 from any other phone. (2/2) -Michael D
@xXRandomTaskXx Hi, Stewart. I hope you are well today. I am sorry, the two are not able to be used together. - Sarahjane

@paulswift36 Did you get a screenshot of the discount at all? The only one that would usually be applied online would be if you were adding an additional line, where the new phone would get a 10% discount. -Michael D
Finally arrived @EE https://t.co/9UAwSYncJg
@EE Online, it was just available

@paulswift36 Hi Paul. It is great to hear you are looking to upgrade. 

I'm not able to see your upgrade offers here, but any offers are always subject to change. Did you speak to someone over the phone initially or was it online? -Michael D
@EE @beatport @Rudimental @ariellefree @itsjuniorsimba Class set @ariellefree

@KhanCatOfficial Hiya Khan :) How are you? I always want you to be getting the best connection as I know it's important. I can certainly take a look at this and find out what's going on. Can you pop me a DM with your postcode and mobile number, please? -Kelsey https://t.co/m14c5xhQi0

@ersatz1967 It is more in relation to communicating with the networks whilst abroad which is why it can take a little time. It is not always that this happens however. Is there anything I can check out for you? - Casey
